New Records: Cape Verde dominated the match, winning 3-0 against Mozambique in the Africa Cup 2024.
Key Match Events: Bebé scored the first goal for Cape Verde at minute 32'
Ryan Mendes scored a goal for Cape Verde at minute 51'
Kevin Pina scored a goal for Cape Verde at minute 69'
Cape Verde won 3-0 at home over Mozambique.
Pre-Game Insights: Mozambique is going through a bad moment in the Africa Cup 2024, with one point after playing one match.
Cape Verde has had a good performance throughout the Africa Cup 2024, with three points after playing one match.
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde won 3-0 against Mozambique in the Africa Cup 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Stade Félix Houphouët Boigny stadium in Abidjan, Ivory Coast.
The stadium has a capacity for approximately 40,000 spectators.
Others: The refereeing team was led by Jean Jacques Ndala Ngambo.
